posts.post_content:
Have a handful of tougher OJs available to trade.  All are pictured below. Beautiful image on Welch with remnants of very faint pencil below his name.  Robertson, Mascot and O’Connell all appear on the “scarcity” list in the OJ Book.

Looking to acquire several Louisville players (Mack, Ramsey, Tomney, Weaver), as well as any of the following:

Kid Baldwin
Cartwright
Charles Kelly
C. Mack
McQuaid
O Shafer
T Shafer
Scheibeck
Shannon
Deacon White

Happy to consider other trades as well (have a pretty long want list). Always interested to see what other have.  Please PM. Thanks.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=444712&d=1615130194[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=444713&d=1615130205[/IMG]

posts.post_title: I would like to discuss your HOFers.
posts.post_content: Interested in Deacon and Welch and any others you may have. What are you looking to trade for? I am also a buyer.
Hi... nothing to trade but lookng to buy Deacon White card. Can you quote price? Thanks
On the other hand... I may consider trade. 1915 Cracker Jack: Connie Mack, Branch Rickey and Charles Comiskey. All Non Graded ... I can send photos if interested. Thanks again

The cards pictured are the ones available for trade.

The cards listed (including Deacon White) are the ones he's looking to acquire.

Oh, got it. Thanks, Rob.

Phil
